articles.title: 10 health benefits of mushrooms, the most nutritious powerhouse - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Health benefits of mushrooms: Low in calories and fat, mushrooms packed with essential nutrients. They are rich in B vitamins which support energy metabolism and skin health.
articles.content: Antioxidant: They are rich in antioxidants, like ergothioneine and selenium, which help neutralise free radicals. These can damage cells and lead to chronic diseases
